---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This file is the `package.json` for the `wrappy` npm package, version 1.0.2. It defines the package's metadata, dependencies, and scripts for a utility that wraps callbacks.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
The package.json file contains essential metadata about the `wrappy` package, including its name, version, description, and entry point.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| name | "wrappy" | The name of the package |
| version | "1.0.2" | The current version of the package |
| description | "Callback wrapping utility" | A brief description of the package's purpose |
| main | "wrappy.js" | The main entry point of the package |

### Files
#### Description
Specifies the files to be included when the package is published.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| files | ["wrappy.js"] | An array containing the main JavaScript file for the package |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines the scripts that can be run using `npm run`.

| Name | Command | Description |
|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| test | "tap --coverage test/*.js" | Runs the test suite using the `tap` testing framework with coverage |

### Dependencies
#### Description
Lists the production and development dependencies of the package.

| Type | Dependencies | Description |
|:-----|:-------------|:------------|
| dependencies | {} | No production dependencies |
| devDependencies | { "tap": "^2.3.1" } | Development dependency on the `tap` testing framework |

### Repository
#### Description
Specifies the type and URL of the source code repository.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| type | "git" | The version control system used |
| url | "https://github.com/npm/wrappy" | The URL of the GitHub repository |

### Author
#### Description
Provides information about the package author.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| author | "Isaac Z. Schlueter &lt;i@izs.me&gt; (http://blog.izs.me/)" | The name, email, and website of the package author |

### License
#### Description
Specifies the license under which the package is distributed.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| license | "ISC" | The package is licensed under the ISC license |

### Bugs and Homepage
#### Description
Provides URLs for reporting issues and the package's homepage.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| bugs | "https://github.com/npm/wrappy/issues" | The URL for reporting issues |
| homepage | "https://github.com/npm/wrappy" | The URL of the package's homepage |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| tap | A test framework used for running tests and generating coverage reports |

This `package.json` file defines a minimal npm package with no production dependencies and a single development dependency on the `tap` testing framework. The package is designed to provide a callback wrapping utility, with its main functionality implemented in the `wrappy.js` file (not provided in this context). The package is maintained by Isaac Z. Schlueter and is hosted on GitHub under the npm organization.
